title: New: Dream Harlowe – Blue Baby
body:
**Dream Harlowe’s** intoxicating debut track, Moarte, served as a stunning introduction, and her second offering, _Blue Baby_, is another hugely exciting step for her.

Again information is hard to come by – recorded with the assistance of Seattle producer Andy Meyer, there’s touches of Lana and Bjork to the swirling elegance that engulfs much of Blue Baby. Accompanied by a video featuring spliced together clips of Dream Harlowe as a child, there’s a real sense of identity to this project that’s becoming ever more apparent. Check it out below.
